name: Swing Tower
description:
Swing Tower is a small game that I developed during one of my Degree modules that I then expanded upon at a later date. The core game mechanic is rope climbing and this is utilised to escape the water that rises up the tower to kill you.

NOTE: Jumping from the ropes happens at a 90 degree angle to the way the camera is facing.

Controls:

WASD - Move Player

E - Interact

Q - Close Popup

Z - Climb Up Rope

C - Climb Down Rope

Spacebar - Jump
